column2: I'm sorry to hear of your experience at JINYA. Please know that this is unacceptable and that my general manager
column4: has spoken to the server at length to determine how and why this happened. On a positive note
column5: I greatly appreciate your kind words regarding our food. Should you consider visiting us again
column6: and I hope that you do
column9: Sara or Wynne (all of whom are floor managers)
column10: and they will make sure your experience matches the quality of our food.
